forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with periods of light rain and snow later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low -6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low 24F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 8 to 12 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 24F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of snow after midnight. Low -8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low 21F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 28F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow flurries and snow showers. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 18F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
